description:
The four Arayashiki leaders represent the Four Symbols of the Chinese constellation, corresponding to the four mythological creatures.
The creature of the West is Byakko (白虎), the White Tiger.
Byakko accuses http://anidb.net/ch5897 [Rumiko] of being responsible for losing http://anidb.net/ch40649 [Benzaiten]. She demands not to hand over http://anidb.net/ch40719 [Yoriko] to http://anidb.net/ch40610 [Darklore] unopposed but objects http://anidb.net/ch40602 [Seiryuu]`s plan of using http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] as Yoriko would then just be under the control of another mindbreaker. Later she performs a sneak attack at Kyouta; when Rumiko intervenes, Byakko secedes from http://anidb.net/ch40598 [Arayashiki].
name: Arayashiki West
